D

damage - Variable in class thewizardstower.Obstacle
This refers to the amount of damage that the object can inflict on a character.
damage(Character) - Method in class thewizardstower.Hole
This method may or may not inflict the damage that a character's health experiences once it falls into the hole, which depends on its depth.
damage(Character) - Method in class thewizardstower.Obstacle
This method inflicts the Obstacle's damage to a character that comes into contact with it.
dash(String) - Method in class thewizardstower.Character
This method temporarily allows the character to more quickly move in the specified direction for a temporary amount of time and distance.
defend() - Method in class thewizardstower.Weapon
 
defend(Character) - Method in class thewizardstower.Character
This method allows the specified character to not be able to take any damage from direct attacks.
description - Variable in class thewizardstower.Floor
This refers to the current stage of the floor.
description - Variable in class thewizardstower.Item
 
direction - Variable in class thewizardstower.Entity
 
doubleJump() - Method in class thewizardstower.Character
This method allow the character to gain double the height by pressing the jump key twice.
down1 - Variable in class thewizardstower.Entity
 
down2 - Variable in class thewizardstower.Entity
 
downPressed - Variable in class thewizardstower.controller.KeyHandler
 
draw(Graphics2D) - Method in class thewizardstower.controller.TileManager
 
draw(Graphics2D) - Method in class thewizardstower.Player
This allows the sprite images of the player to be drawn and changed to create moving animations and directions based on the key that they pressed.
dropItem(Item) - Method in class thewizardstower.Character
This method allows the character to drop specified item, removing it from their inventory.
drown(Character) - Method in class thewizardstower.Moat
This method continuously decreases a character's health while they are submerged inside the moat.
